name: oxylabs_ai_crawler
description:
Tool useful for crawling a website from starting url and returning data in a specified format.

Schema is required only if output_format is json.
'render_javascript' is used to render javascript heavy websites.
'return_sources_limit' is used to limit the number of sources to return,
for example if you expect results from single source, you can set it to 1.

url.description: The URL from which crawling will be started.
url.title: Url

user_prompt.description: What information user wants to extract from the domain.
user_prompt.title: User Prompt

output_format.description: The format of the output. If json, the schema is required. Markdown returns full text of the page.
output_format.title: Output Format

schema.description: The schema to use for the crawl. Only required if output_format is json.
schema.title: Schema

render_javascript.description: Whether to render the HTML of the page using javascript. Much slower, therefore use it only for websites that require javascript to render the page. Unless user asks to use it, first try to crawl the page without it. If results are unsatisfactory, try to use it.
render_javascript.title: Render Javascript

return_sources_limit.description: The maximum number of sources to return.
return_sources_limit.title: Return Sources Limit

geo_location.description: Two letter ISO country code to use for the crawl proxy.
geo_location.title: Geo Location

name: oxylabs_ai_scraper
description:
Scrape the contents of the web page and return the data in the specified format.

Schema is required only if output_format is json.
'render_javascript' is used to render javascript heavy websites.

output_format.description: The format of the output. If json, the schema is required. Markdown returns full text of the page.
output_format.title: Output Format

schema.description: The schema to use for the scrape. Only required if output_format is json.
schema.title: Schema

render_javascript.description: Whether to render the HTML of the page using javascript. Much slower, therefore use it only for websites that require javascript to render the page.Unless user asks to use it, first try to scrape the page without it. If results are unsatisfactory, try to use it.
render_javascript.title: Render Javascript

geo_location.description: Two letter ISO country code to use for the scrape proxy.
geo_location.title: Geo Location

name: oxylabs_ai_browser_agent
description:
Run the browser agent and return the data in the specified format.

This tool is useful if you need navigate around the website and do some actions.
It allows navigating to any url, clicking on links, filling forms, scrolling, etc.
Finally it returns the data in the specified format. Schema is required only if output_format is json.
'task_prompt' describes what browser agent should achieve

url.description: The URL to start the browser agent navigation from.
url.title: Url

output_format.description: The output format. Screenshot is base64 encoded jpeg image. Markdown returns full text of the page including links. If json, the schema is required.
output_format.title: Output Format

schema.description: The schema to use for the scrape. Only required if output_format is json.
schema.title: Schema

geo_location.description: Two letter ISO country code to use for the browser proxy.
geo_location.title: Geo Location

name: oxylabs_ai_search
description:
Search the web based on a provided query.

'return_content' is used to return markdown content for each search result. If 'return_content'
    is set to True, you don't need to use ai_scraper to get the content of the search results urls,
    because it is already included in the search results.
if 'return_content' is set to True, prefer lower 'limit' to reduce payload size.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return.
limit.title: Limit

render_javascript.description: Whether to render the HTML of the page using javascript. Much slower, therefore use it only if user asks to use it.First try to search with setting it to False.
render_javascript.title: Render Javascript

return_content.description: Whether to return markdown content of the search results.
return_content.title: Return Content

geo_location.description: Two letter ISO country code to use for the search proxy.
geo_location.title: Geo Location

name: oxylabs_generate_schema
description: Generate a json schema in openapi format.

name: oxylabs_ai_map
description: Tool useful for mapping website's urls.

url.description: The URL from which URLs mapping will be started.
url.title: Url

user_prompt.description: What kind of urls user wants to find.
user_prompt.title: User Prompt

render_javascript.description: Whether to render the HTML of the page using javascript. Much slower, therefore use it only for websites that require javascript to render the page. Unless user asks to use it, first try to crawl the page without it. If results are unsatisfactory, try to use it.
render_javascript.title: Render Javascript

return_sources_limit.description: The maximum number of sources to return.
return_sources_limit.title: Return Sources Limit

geo_location.description: Two letter ISO country code to use for the mapping proxy.
geo_location.title: Geo Location

name: oxylabs_universal_scraper
description:
Get a content of any webpage.

Supports browser rendering, parsing of certain webpages
and different output formats.

render.description:
Whether a headless browser should be used to render the page.
        For example:
            - 'html' when browser is required to render the page.
render.title: Render

user_agent_type.description: Device type and browser that will be used to determine User-Agent header value.
user_agent_type.title: User Agent Type

geo_location.description:
The geographical location that the result should be adapted for.
        Use ISO-3166 country codes.
        Examples:
            - 'California, United States'
            - 'Mexico'
            - 'US' for United States
            - 'DE' for Germany
            - 'FR' for France
geo_location.title: Geo Location

output_format.description:
The format of the output. Works only when parse parameter is false.
            - links - Most efficient when the goal is navigation or finding specific URLs. Use this first when you need to locate a specific page within a website.
            - md - Best for extracting and reading visible content once you've found the right page. Use this to get structured content that's easy to read and process.
            - html - Should be used sparingly only when you need the raw HTML structure, JavaScript code, or styling information.
output_format.title: Output Format

name: oxylabs_google_search_scraper
description:
Scrape Google Search results.

Supports content parsing, different user agent types, pagination,
domain, geolocation, locale parameters and different output formats.

parse.description: Should result be parsed. If the result is not parsed, the output_format parameter is applied.
parse.title: Parse

render.description:
Whether a headless browser should be used to render the page.
        For example:
            - 'html' when browser is required to render the page.
render.title: Render

user_agent_type.description: Device type and browser that will be used to determine User-Agent header value.
user_agent_type.title: User Agent Type

limit.description: Number of results to retrieve in each page.
limit.title: Limit

domain.description:
Domain localization for Google.
        Use country top level domains.
        For example:
            - 'co.uk' for United Kingdom
            - 'us' for United States
            - 'fr' for France
domain.title: Domain

geo_location.description:
The geographical location that the result should be adapted for.
        Use ISO-3166 country codes.
        Examples:
            - 'California, United States'
            - 'Mexico'
            - 'US' for United States
            - 'DE' for Germany
            - 'FR' for France
geo_location.title: Geo Location

locale.description:
Set 'Accept-Language' header value which changes your Google search page web interface language.
        Examples:
            - 'en-US' for English, United States
            - 'de-AT' for German, Austria
            - 'fr-FR' for French, France
locale.title: Locale

ad_mode.description: If true will use the Google Ads source optimized for the paid ads.
ad_mode.title: Ad Mode

output_format.description:
The format of the output. Works only when parse parameter is false.
            - links - Most efficient when the goal is navigation or finding specific URLs. Use this first when you need to locate a specific page within a website.
            - md - Best for extracting and reading visible content once you've found the right page. Use this to get structured content that's easy to read and process.
            - html - Should be used sparingly only when you need the raw HTML structure, JavaScript code, or styling information.
output_format.title: Output Format

name: oxylabs_amazon_search_scraper
description:
Scrape Amazon search results.

Supports content parsing, different user agent types, pagination,
domain, geolocation, locale parameters and different output formats.
Supports Amazon specific parameters such as category id, merchant id, currency.

category_id.description: Search for items in a particular browse node (product category).
category_id.title: Category Id

merchant_id.description: Search for items sold by a particular seller.
merchant_id.title: Merchant Id

currency.description: Currency that will be used to display the prices.
currency.title: Currency

parse.description: Should result be parsed. If the result is not parsed, the output_format parameter is applied.
parse.title: Parse

render.description:
Whether a headless browser should be used to render the page.
        For example:
            - 'html' when browser is required to render the page.
render.title: Render

user_agent_type.description: Device type and browser that will be used to determine User-Agent header value.
user_agent_type.title: User Agent Type

domain.description:
Domain localization for Google.
        Use country top level domains.

            - 'us' for United States
            - 'fr' for France
domain.title: Domain

The geographical location that the result should be adapted for.
        Use ISO-3166 country codes.
        Examples:
            - 'California, United States'
            - 'Mexico'
            - 'US' for United States
            - 'DE' for Germany
            - 'FR' for France
geo_location.title: Geo Location

locale.description:
Set 'Accept-Language' header value which changes your Google search page web interface language.
        Examples:
            - 'en-US' for English, United States
            - 'de-AT' for German, Austria
            - 'fr-FR' for French, France
locale.title: Locale

output_format.description:
The format of the output. Works only when parse parameter is false.
            - links - Most efficient when the goal is navigation or finding specific URLs. Use this first when you need to locate a specific page within a website.
            - md - Best for extracting and reading visible content once you've found the right page. Use this to get structured content that's easy to read and process.
            - html - Should be used sparingly only when you need the raw HTML structure, JavaScript code, or styling information.
output_format.title: Output Format

name: oxylabs_amazon_product_scraper
description:
Scrape Amazon products.

Supports content parsing, different user agent types, domain,
geolocation, locale parameters and different output formats.
Supports Amazon specific parameters such as currency and getting
more accurate pricing data with auto select variant.

autoselect_variant.description: To get accurate pricing/buybox data, set this parameter to true.
autoselect_variant.title: Autoselect Variant
